DatabaseConnection - Class in <Unnamed>
Manages all transactions to and from the MySQL database
DatabaseConnection() - Constructor for class DatabaseConnection
Automatically connects to the database Call close() to close connection before program terminates
db - Variable in class CommandHandler
The MySQL database connection from JDBC
dbUrl - Variable in class DatabaseConnection
URL of the database
doGet(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class ServerComm
 
downloadIncrement(String) - Method in class CommandHandler
Prepares incrementing the numDownloads for uploaded layouts in database
downloadIncrement(int, String, String) - Method in class DatabaseConnection
Increments the numDownloads of a given uploaded layout
